thread.title: Sharpton blasts Trump administration: Stephon Clark's death 'not a local matter'

title: Sharpton blasts Trump administration: Stephon Clark's death 'not a local matter'
text:
Sharpton blasts Trump administration: Stephon Clark's death 'not a local matter' Thursday, March 29, 2018 - 01:12 
Civil rights activist Rev. Al Sharpton slammed White House spokesperson Sarah Sanders for calling the death of 22-year-old Stephon Clark, who was killed by police on March 18th, a 'local matter'. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
Civil rights activist Rev. Al Sharpton slammed White House spokesperson Sarah Sanders for calling the death of 22-year-old Stephon Clark, who was killed by police on March 18th, a 'local matter'. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2J7H5iv
